trans-unit.source: Videos, samples, and tutorials in Azure Search
trans-unit.target: Videos, samples, and tutorials in Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Find all videos, samples, demos and tutorials created for Azure Search in one central list.
trans-unit.target: Find all videos, samples, demos and tutorials created for Azure Search in one central list.

trans-unit.source: Azure Search: tutorials, video demos, and samples
trans-unit.target: Azure Search: tutorials, video demos, and samples

trans-unit.source: Get up to speed faster with the following videos, demos, tutorials, and sample apps.
trans-unit.target: Get up to speed faster with the following videos, demos, tutorials, and sample apps.

trans-unit.source: Demo sites
trans-unit.target: Demo sites

trans-unit.source: [**New York City (NYC) Jobs portal demo for Azure Search**](http://aka.ms/azjobsdemo) is an ASP.NET web site that demonstrates Azure Search capabilities using data from the NYC Open Data Initiative.
trans-unit.target: [**New York City (NYC) Jobs portal demo for Azure Search**](http://aka.ms/azjobsdemo) is an ASP.NET web site that demonstrates Azure Search capabilities using data from the NYC Open Data Initiative.

trans-unit.source: [**Try App Service + Azure Search**](search-tryappservice.md) is a free one-hour session with Azure Search that includes data, a functional web application, and source code that you can modify online to test drive various search features.
trans-unit.target: [**Try App Service + Azure Search**](search-tryappservice.md) is a free one-hour session with Azure Search that includes data, a functional web application, and source code that you can modify online to test drive various search features.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Virtual Academy: Adding Azure Search to your Websites and Apps
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Virtual Academy: Adding Azure Search to your Websites and Apps

trans-unit.source: 7-part series on how to add Azure Search to an application, presented by Liam Cavanagh, Janusz Lembicz, and Bernardita Torres Garayar.
trans-unit.target: 7-part series on how to add Azure Search to an application, presented by Liam Cavanagh, Janusz Lembicz, and Bernardita Torres Garayar.

trans-unit.source: Data Exposed: Azure Search Suggestions
trans-unit.target: Data Exposed: Azure Search Suggestions

trans-unit.source: Video recording of suggestions (also known as type-ahead or autocomplete queries that appear as potential search terms as a user is typing a term), presented by Liam Cavanagh, 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Video recording of suggestions (also known as type-ahead or autocomplete queries that appear as potential search terms as a user is typing a term), presented by Liam Cavanagh, 15 minutes.

trans-unit.source: In Azure Search, fuzzy matching is implemented through suggestions.
trans-unit.target: In Azure Search, fuzzy matching is implemented through suggestions.

trans-unit.source: How to Add Suggestions to your Search Applications
trans-unit.target: How to Add Suggestions to your Search Applications

trans-unit.source: Learn how to implement suggestions, commonly called auto complete.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to implement suggestions, commonly called auto complete.

trans-unit.source: This demo walks through a number of topics including creating an MVC4 applications that leverages Azure Search suggestions, use of the Twitter typeahead.js library to build out an effective autosuggest component in JavaScript, and using fuzzy suggestions to allow you to bring back suggestions even if the user misspells the word.
trans-unit.target: This demo walks through a number of topics including creating an MVC4 applications that leverages Azure Search suggestions, use of the Twitter typeahead.js library to build out an effective autosuggest component in JavaScript, and using fuzzy suggestions to allow you to bring back suggestions even if the user misspells the word.

trans-unit.source: TechNet Virtual Lab: Building a Microsoft Azure Search Application
trans-unit.target: TechNet Virtual Lab: Building a Microsoft Azure Search Application

trans-unit.source: Virtual lab that provides a development environment, tools, documentation, and data.
trans-unit.target: Virtual lab that provides a development environment, tools, documentation, and data.

trans-unit.source: You will need an Azure account, either a trial subscription or your personal Azure subscription, to complete the lab.
trans-unit.target: You will need an Azure account, either a trial subscription or your personal Azure subscription, to complete the lab.

trans-unit.source: Geospatial search app development using Azure Search
trans-unit.target: Geospatial search app development using Azure Search

trans-unit.source: Use Bing maps and coordinates to support geospatial searches.
trans-unit.target: Use Bing maps and coordinates to support geospatial searches.

trans-unit.target: Synchronize SQL Server Data with Azure Search

trans-unit.target: Blog post that explains how to load data from SQL Server relational databases to an Azure Search index.

trans-unit.source: Code samples
trans-unit.target: Code samples

trans-unit.source: [**https://github.com/AzureSearch**](https://github.com/AzureSearch) is a GitHub repository for Azure Search containing code samples created by the Azure Search development team.
trans-unit.target: [**https://github.com/AzureSearch**](https://github.com/AzureSearch) is a GitHub repository for Azure Search containing code samples created by the Azure Search development team.

trans-unit.source: You can browse the repository to see what it contains, or click links below to go directly to specific samples.
trans-unit.target: You can browse the repository to see what it contains, or click links below to go directly to specific samples.

trans-unit.source: JavaIndexerDemo
trans-unit.target: JavaIndexerDemo

trans-unit.source: NodeJSIndexerDemo
trans-unit.target: NodeJSIndexerDemo

trans-unit.source: [**.NET-2015-02-28-Sample**](https://github.com/AzureSearch/.NET-2015-02-28-Sample) is an ASP.NET MVC 5 application that uses the .NET client library for search operations.
trans-unit.target: [**.NET-2015-02-28-Sample**](https://github.com/AzureSearch/.NET-2015-02-28-Sample) is an ASP.NET MVC 5 application that uses the .NET client library for search operations.

trans-unit.source: A separate GitHub repo is used for [**AzureSearch-Microsoft Virtual Academy Training Materials**](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/AzureSearch-MVA).
trans-unit.target: A separate GitHub repo is used for [**AzureSearch-Microsoft Virtual Academy Training Materials**](https://github.com/MicrosoftLearning/AzureSearch-MVA).

trans-unit.source: It includes several samples used in the 7-part course.
trans-unit.target: It includes several samples used in the 7-part course.

trans-unit.source: On CodePlex, you can find several samples published during the public preview that are still relevant in the current version.
trans-unit.target: On CodePlex, you can find several samples published during the public preview that are still relevant in the current version.

trans-unit.source: [**Management REST API Demo**](https://azuresearchmgmtapi.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that uses the Management REST API.
trans-unit.target: [**Management REST API Demo**](https://azuresearchmgmtapi.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that uses the Management REST API.

trans-unit.source: [**AdventureWorks Demo**](https://azuresearchadventureworksdemo.codeplex.com/) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.
trans-unit.target: [**AdventureWorks Demo**](https://azuresearchadventureworksdemo.codeplex.com/) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.

trans-unit.source: [**Suggestions Demo**](https://azsearchsuggestions.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.
trans-unit.target: [**Suggestions Demo**](https://azsearchsuggestions.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.

trans-unit.source: [**GeoSearch sample**](https://azuresearchgeospatial.codeplex.com/) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.
trans-unit.target: [**GeoSearch sample**](https://azuresearchgeospatial.codeplex.com/) is an ASP.NET MVC 4 application.

trans-unit.source: [**SQL Server to Azure Search Sync Sample**](http://sqlserver2azuresearch.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that loads a SQL Server rowset from an embedded local database.
trans-unit.target: [**SQL Server to Azure Search Sync Sample**](http://sqlserver2azuresearch.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that loads a SQL Server rowset from an embedded local database.

trans-unit.source: [**Scoring Profiles Demo**](https://azuresearchscoringprofiles.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that defines, executes, and updates a scoring profile for tuning search results.
trans-unit.target: [**Scoring Profiles Demo**](https://azuresearchscoringprofiles.codeplex.com/) is a Windows console application that defines, executes, and updates a scoring profile for tuning search results.
